full_title: OKS Viscose Rayon Roll-Type Cleaning Cloths, 30pcs Pink and White Kitchen Towel Sheets 35cm x 25cm, Reusable Kitchen Cleaning Cloth and Dusting Cloth Wipes for Daily Cleaning Supplies

reasoning.keyword_integration: Prioritized high-volume terms by embedding 'kitchen towel', 'cleaning cloth', 'cleaning supplies', 'kitchen cloth', 'kitchen wipes', 'cleaning wipes', 'dusting cloth', 'kitchen cleaning cloth' and 'cloths' as natural descriptive phrases while accurately reflecting material, size, color, quantity, and roll-type format.
reasoning.title_structure: Followed Brand + Material + ProductType + Quantity/Size + Color + Use Case pattern, using connectors like 'and' and 'for' so the title reads as a coherent product description instead of a keyword list.
reasoning.compliance: All details match verified product facts, no invented features, under 200 characters, brand capitalized, and quantity/size presented clearly for shopper clarity.
